DOC.brief_summary: Gelatin tannate possesses astringent, antibacterial, and anti-inflammatory properties. It is increasingly being marketed as an antidiarrheal drug. A randomized, double blind, placebo-control trial was performed to assess the effectiveness of GT in management of children with acute gastroenteritis.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Gelatin Tannate in Treatment Acute Gastroenteritis in Children.
DOC.criteria: children < 5 years old diarrhea (defined as the passage of 3 or more loose or watery stools per day) for > 1 day but < 5 days inform consent sign regularly used antibiotics, probiotics, gelatin tannate, diosmectite, racecadotril within 7 days before admission underlying gastrointestinal tract disorder presenting with diarrhea breastfeeding >50% malnutrition (weight/high <3pc)
